items.name: Freeform
items.metaDescription: Freeform is a flexible form-building tool that adapts to your project's needs. Its intuitive builder is easy to use and integrates seamlessly with popular CRMs and email marketing services.

items.name: Calendar
items.metaDescription: Calendar is an effective event management and calendaring plugin. Its user-friendly interface simplifies the creation of events with complex recurring rules and exclusions.
